pages.text: The Eraser is a utility tool that allows you to reset a folder's assignment, letting you repurpose it for storing a different item type.

pages.title: Using the Eraser
pages.text: To use the Eraser:$(br)$(br)1. Make sure the folder is completely empty (remove all items)$(br)2. Hold the Eraser in your main hand$(br)3. Place the empty folder in your off-hand$(br)4. Right-click with the Eraser$(br)$(br)The folder will be reset and can now store a different type of item.

pages.title: Important Notes
pages.text: $(li)The eraser has limited durability (64 uses)$(li)The folder must be completely empty before erasing$(li)Works with both standard and NBT folders
